description:
Taking advantage of the summer holidays, the family goes to Singapore. Bunji is amazed by everything and becomes the laughing stock but kids from other countries seem to do the same; Bunji is ecstatic to see a water slide at the pool when the stronger Russian, Misha appears. Bunji can`t create quite as big of a splash as Misha; After Singapore, they are off to the Philippines to meet up with dad who shows them around; Bunji and Fumi are around the same age as the street children who are begging for money.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Summer vacation is not over yet / Summer vacation is still not over / Not yet, not yet. Summer vacation is not over yet / Not yet, not yet, not yet. Summer vacation is not over.
夏休みは終わらない / まだ夏休みは終わらない / まだまだ夏休みは終わらない / まだまだまだ夏休みは終わらない
